sentence.Network_en: He imprisoned her, in a figurative sense.
sentence.Network_cn: 在比喻的意义上,他把她关在牢里了.

sentence.Network_en: His career spanned some 50 years and encompassed both abstract and figurative painting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的职业生涯延续了大约50年，作品既有抽象画也有写实画。

sentence.Network_en: Here the word is used in a figurative sense.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里该字是在比喻的意义上使用的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... （lucr 钱+ ） figurative a 比喻的 ） appreciative a 感谢的；赞赏的.
一个词的比喻用法英语叫figurative use, 而用其字面的意思就叫literal use。如果一个人真有一副骷髅骨架在衣橱里,你就可以说:He has a skeleton in his cup.
全面开花 (figurative)open up or develop all of the varios aspects全面实施以德育为核心、以创新精神和实践能力为重点的素质教育.
abstract 抽象派figurative 造型的brush 画笔

list.abs: 描绘 figure out 合计;计算出;断定 at present 现在,目前 someday adv. (今后)有一天 temporary adj. 暂时的;临时的 salesgirl n. 女售货员 rush n. 冲;奔.
新商务网-关注商业崛起的力量 ... 图说 SIGHT 人物 FIGURE 文化 CULTURE.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from late Latin figurativus, from figurare 'to form or fashion', from figura (see figure)

entry.def: If you use a word or expression in a figurative sense, you use it with a more abstract or imaginative meaning than its ordinary literal one.

example.ex: ...an event that will change your route — in both the literal and figurative sense.
example.tran: 一个无论从字面还是比喻意义上来说都将改变你的路线的事件

entry.def: Figurative art is a style of art in which people and things are shown in a realistic way.

example.ex: His career spanned some 50 years and encompassed both abstract and figurative painting.
example.tran: 他的职业生涯延续了大约50年，作品既有抽象画也有写实画。

means.word_mean: 1. (used of the meanings of words or text) not literal; using figures of speech;
2. consisting of or forming human or animal figures;

sentences.sentence: "the figurative art of the humanistic tradition"- Herbert Read

auth_sentence.content: By a figurative...speech he declareth the horror...of the damned.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: By a figurative...speech he declareth the horror...of the damned.

auth_sentence.content: Such speech acts may be figurative or literal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such speech acts may be figurative or literal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such speech acts may be figurative or literal.

auth_sentence.content: Some of his figurative work is Goya-esque.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of his figurative work is Goya-esque.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表
